title: New: Elliot Moss – Slip
content: Twenty year old Elliot Moss impressed massively with two tracks towards the latter end of last year, and has now uploaded another track lifted from 2013’s fantastic Highspeeds LP. Slip moves slightly away from the Radiohead-leaning experimental-rock of Big Bad Wolf, and finds him fashioning out a more James Blake influenced sound, yet remaining as deeply immersive.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
